parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search string. Searches in parking lot name and address

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Search from date as ISO string

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: applies to all sharings if no type specified, otherwise applies to specific type sharings

parameters.name: pageFrom
parameters.description: last lot name from previous search ... for endless scroll

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: if specified only particular list is retrieved and pageSize is considered

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Location for nearby sharings to be returned in "latitude:longitude:radius" format, radius (in metres) can be omited

allowIPermitCards.description: If true, parking with iPermit card is allowed

from.description: Date from which parking session is booked

to.description: Date until which parking session is booked

bookedBy.description: Identification of entity for which is reservation made

parkingSession.description: Present is someone is currently parking on this slot

exactSlotId.description: if provided, only this slot will be considered

excludeSlotIds.description: if provided, these slots will be excluded

parkingSessionId.description: Id of session that reports occupancy

interval.description: Block subinterval to be reserved, null for whole block

usedBy.description: Identifier of entity that is going to use this spot. Fill just one property.

amount.description: Price amount as whole number in cents (100 means 1.00 eur)

execution.description: If true, price is upfront and should be paid before service is provided

isOpenGateSupported.description: Indicator whether open gate functionality is supported

isExtendSupported.description: Indicator whether extend reservation functionality is supported

usedBy.description: Identifier of entity that is going to use this spot. Fill just one property.

slotId.description: Particular slot id or omit to any other slot

reallocate.description: If true and target slot is already reserved by other reservation, the reservation will be reallocated to another slot

changeUsedBy.description: Identifier of entity that is going to use this spot. Fill just one property.

vehicleRequired.description: Is default vehicle required to be set

cardType.description: Type of parking or permit card

from.description: Threshold between reservation and session start to be paired together

to.description: Threshold between reservation and session end to be paired together

immediate.description: If true, wallet payment will be executed immediately

paymentIntent.description: Stripe ID for created payment intent

amount.description: Price amount as whole number in cents (100 means 1.00 eur)

execution.description: If true, price is upfront and should be paid before service is provided

weekly.description: Sharing that repeats on specified days at specified times

unit.description: Unit for which price should be applied for
